A list of data science events and meetings Overview

A list of data science events and meetings Overview This site attempts to list data science events and groups. Please feel free to add any missing group or conference. To propose a change, just click the pencil icon in the top left hand corner of the page. We also maintain a separate list of R events and meetups. Technical bit The html files for this document live in the docs/ directory of the repository. Travis creates the html files from the .Rmd files and commits them to the docs/ directory.

1 Events The format for listing an event is: Month: event name & link. Town, Country. Twitter name. 2017 January: StanCon: New York, USA. March: Strata + Hadoop World: San Jose, USA. May: Strata + Hadoop World: London, UK. July: Strata + Hadoop World: Beijing, China. September: Strata + Hadoop World: New York, USA. 2016 December: Strata + Hadoop World: Singapore.
2 Data Science User Groups 2.1 Asia 2.2 Europe 2.3 Middle East/ Africa 2.4 North America 2.5 Oceania 2.6 South America

2 Data Science User Groups Groups are listed by contintent then by country. Where appropriate, groups are divided within country, e.g.Â in the USA, by state & in the United Kingdom, by member country. The suggested format for listing a group is Town name: Group name & link; @Twitter_handle 2.1 Asia 2.2 Europe 2.2.1 Belgium Brussels: Data Science group 2.2.2 UK England London: Data Science London Newcastle: Machine Learning NE; @ML_NorthEast Scotland Edinburgh: Scotland Data Science Technology Meetup/ 2.3 Middle East/ Africa 2.4 North America 2.4.1 Canada 2.4.2 United States of America New York New York: NYC Data Science Washington Washington: DC data science learning group 2.5 Oceania 2.5.1 Australia 2.5.2 New Zealand 2.6 South America
